reviewText: Same as others here, I have a copy of this with the exact same UPC code and none of my DVD players will play it.  It will play on my computer DVD drive, but I don't want to watch a concert on my computer.

This is essential for any fan of 'Roxy Music". This is a concert in France, and it has a great choice of songs. You're at once amazed at their power and energy live, and also at how well they perform even the more sophisticated songs. You will love them even more after watching this, and Bryan is great in his white dinner jacket. They do a cover of John Lennon's 'A Jealous Guy" that is great! This is a high energy concert with a trio of backup singers dancing in unison just about the entire concert. I love it!
I bought this to use in the DVD player in the USA and it does not recognize it in three players
Good concert --I've seen it before on VHS-- but I never saw this: I got "wrong region" message on my US player, though the product description said "All regions"
